page.title: 07TOWER'S FARM
page.content: This farm is owned by Edward Towers. At the moment he is having an open season. People can come and watch the milking of his goats. Also on sale is his ewes milk and ewes cheese. This is the commercial part of his farm, he appeared on a television programme on farming a while ago. This farm is a subject of local interest as goats and ewes are not as widely spread nowadays. Mrs Stevenson from Over Kellet is employed in the dairy section of this farm.The cheese, milk and yoghurts are different from ordinary products as they have a sourer taste. The cheese is covered in wax to keep it germ free and fresh. The wax is a yellowy cream colour. The cheese is sold to local villagers and tourists he also sells it to the local shops. (cont)
